title: Interactive Calibration for Human-AI Teams
abstract: We introduce a method for interactive calibration where users iteratively adjust model outputs to match human expectations, improving downstream decision-making.

title: Robustness via User-in-the-Loop Evaluation
abstract: We propose evaluation protocols that incorporate human feedback to better assess model robustness under real-world shifts.

title: Fairness Constraints for Interactive Systems
abstract: A framework for adding fairness constraints into interactive decision support systems with practical case studies.

title: Privacy-Preserving Personalization at Scale
abstract: Techniques to personalize models using federated and encrypted learning techniques without exposing sensitive data.

title: Designing User Studies for ML Interpretability
abstract: Guidelines and templates for reproducible user studies evaluating ML interpretability in practice.

title: Open Data and Reproducible Pipelines
abstract: Best practices for reproducible research pipelines and open data release in ML labs.
